meanings.definition: A machine or device used to remove moisture from clothes or other items.
meanings.sent1: The dryer quickly dried my wet clothes.
meanings.sent2: She put her wet towel in the dryer to make it dry.
meanings.sent3: The dryer hummed happily as it dried the laundry.
meanings.sent4: The dryer was a superhero, saving the day by drying all the clothes in no time.
meanings.sent5: The dryer's warm embrace turned the damp clothes into cozy warmth.

meanings.sent1: Her clothes were dryer than mine after being in the sun.
meanings.sent2: The desert air was dryer than the humid jungle.
meanings.sent3: The cake was so dry, it made everyone laugh when they tried to eat it.
meanings.sent4: His humor was dryer than the Sahara, leaving everyone puzzled.
meanings.sent5: The toast was dryer than a bone, making it hard to swallow.
